translation.usageDescription: Copy the example above to test, or use it as a reference for your own content.

errors.networkError: Network connection error, please check network settings
errors.apiError: API call failed, please check if AppID and Key are correct
errors.fileError: File processing error, please check file format
errors.unknownError: Unknown error, please try again later
errors.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials, please check AppID and Key
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Request rate limit exceeded, please try again later
errors.textTooLong: Text too long, please translate in segments

tips.credentialsHelp: Please apply for AppID and Key on Baidu Translate Open Platform
tips.fileFormatHelp: Supports JSON, PHP array and other file formats
tips.languageHelp: Select source and target languages for translation
tips.batchTranslation: Supports batch translation for improved efficiency
tips.saveCredentials: Credentials will be saved locally and auto-filled next time

text.title: Text Mode
text.description: Suitable for translating ordinary text content with multi-line support.
text.placeholder:
Please enter text to translate, for example:
This is a translation program that can translate various languages.
It supports text translation in multiple formats.
Hello World!
Welcome to our application.

simpleJSON.title: Simple JSON Mode
simpleJSON.description: Suitable for translating flat-structured JSON data for website internationalization.
simpleJSON.placeholder:
Please enter simple JSON format data to translate, for example:
{
  "welcome_message": "Welcome to our website",
  "login_button": "Login",
  "register_button": "Register",
  "home_title": "Home Page",
  "about_us": "About Us",
  "contact_info": "Contact Information"
}

complexJSON.title: Complex JSON Mode
complexJSON.description: Suitable for translating nested JSON data with multi-level structures.

php.title: PHP Array Mode
php.description: Suitable for translating PHP array files with complex nested structures.
